summary: This document contains financial statements and account summaries for Southern Trust Company Inc. from March 1, 2019, to May 31, 2019, detailing account values, transactions, and income. It includes information about cash deposits, withdrawals, and the performance of various investment funds, as well as disclosures regarding negative interest rates and currency transactions. This document contains financial records related to account transactions, holdings, and disclosures for the period of February 1, 2019, to February 28, 2019. It includes details on cash balances, securities transactions, and investment income, as well as important disclosures regarding the role of Pershing as a clearing broker. This document contains financial information related to portfolio holdings and transactions for the period of January 1, 2019, to January 31, 2019. It includes details about cash, money market funds, corporate bonds, and other financial instruments, along with disclosures regarding tax reporting and investment advice.

persons.name: Martin Zeman
persons.context: Martin Zeman is mentioned as the investment specialist responsible for overseeing the account's performance and advising on asset allocation.
